snippet: Rick Santorum tries out fresh attacks on President Obama at a town hall meeting.
abstract: Rick Santorum tries out fresh attacks on President Obama at a town hall meeting.
lead_paragraph: BRENTWOOD, N.H. -- Rick Santorum flew into New Hampshire late Wednesday afternoon with a tailwind of fresh momentum following his unexpectedly strong challenge to Mitt Romney in the Iowa caucuses.

headline.main: With the Wind at His Back, Santorum Flies Into New Hampshire
